useCourseRunCardAction.enroll.success.he: Umesajiliwa kwa mafanikio. Inaelekeza kwenye kozi.
useCourseRunCardAction.enroll.error.help: Hitilafu imetokea wakati wa kuchakata uandikishaji wako.
useCourseRunCardAction.upgrade.success.h: Uandikishaji wako ulisasishwa. Inaelekeza kwenye kozi.
useCourseRunCardAction.upgrade.error.hel: Hitilafu imetokea wakati wa kuboresha uandikishaji wako.
executive.education.external.course.enro: Tayari umejiandikisha. Nenda kwenye dashibodi yako ya GetSmarter ili uendelee kujifunza.

Hapa ndipo unapokamilisha usajili wako kwa kozi ya elimu ya mtendaji wa edX kupitia GetSmarter. Tafadhali hakikisha kuwa maelezo ya kozi hapa chini ni sahihi na uthibitishe kwa kutumia Mikopo ya Mwanafunzi kwa kitufe cha "Thibitisha usajili".
Msimamizi wako wa masomo tayari ametenga fedha kwa ajili ya usajili huu.
Pesa zako za Mikopo ya Mwanafunzi zitakombolewa katika hatua hii.
Hongera, umekamilisha kujiandikisha kwa kozi yako ya mtandaoni
enterprise.dashboard.course.assignment.c: Msimamizi wako wa mafunzo alighairi kazi moja au zaidi ya kozi iliyo hapa chini.
enterprise.dashboard.course.assignment.d: Makataa ya kujiandikisha katika kozi moja au zaidi hapa chini yamepita.
Hitilafu imetokea wakati wa kurejesha usajili wako wa kozi. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
enterprise.dashboard.course.enrollment.s: Kozi yako ilihifadhiwa kwa ajili ya baadaye.
enterprise.dashboard.tab.courses.recomme: Pata mapendekezo ya kozi kwa ajili yako.
Jibu maswali ya dakika mbili ili utuambie zaidi kuhusu ujuzi na kazi unazopenda, na upokee mara moja mapendekezo ya uzoefu bora wa kujifunza katika orodha kwa ajili yako.
enterprise.dashboard.tab.courses.no.enro: Hujasajiliwa katika kozi zozote zinazofadhiliwa na {enterpriseName} . Wasiliana na msimamizi wako kwa maagizo ya jinsi ya kuanza kujifunza na edX!
enterprise.dashboard.tab.courses.default: Kuanza na edX ni rahisi. Tafuta kwa urahisi kozi kutoka kwa katalogi yako, omba kujiandikisha, na uanze safari yako ya kujifunza.
enterprise.dashboard.sidebar.learner.cre: Shirika lako litatoa kozi kwa wanafunzi. Tafadhali wasiliana na msimamizi wako ikiwa ungependa kuchukua kozi.
Tumia salio la mkopo la mwanafunzi wa shirika lako ili kujiandikisha katika kozi bila malipo ya mfukoni.
enterprise.dashboard.sidebar.need.help.m: Kwa usaidizi wa kiufundi, tembelea Kituo cha Usaidizi cha edX .
enterprise.dashboard.sidebar.request.ben: Ili kuomba manufaa zaidi au kozi mahususi, wasiliana na msimamizi wa edX wa shirika lako .
executive.education.external.course.enro: Utapokea barua pepe kutoka kwa edX kozi yako itakapoanza. Vinginevyo, unaweza kutembelea dashibodi yako ya edX kwa masasisho ya hali ya kozi.
GetSmarter itakutumia barua pepe kozi yako itakapoanza. Vinginevyo, unaweza kutembelea dashibodi yako ya wanafunzi wa GetSmarter kwa masasisho ya hali ya kozi.

Kama sehemu ya ahadi yetu kwa maendeleo yako ya kitaaluma, unaweza kuomba kubadilisha
 tarehe ya kuanza kwa kozi yako au uombe urejeshewe pesa zako ikiwa hujaridhika kikamilifu na siku 14 za kalenda
 ya tarehe yako ya kuanza kwa kozi.
Soma Sheria na Masharti ya GetSmarter kwa sera kamili ya kuahirisha na kughairi kozi.
Kozi hii inagharamiwa na Mikopo ya Mwanafunzi iliyotolewa na shirika lako.
ExecutiveEducation2UError.noOfferAvailab: Hakuna salio la mwanafunzi linalopatikana ili kulipia kozi hii.
ExecutiveEducation2UError.noOfferWithEno: Huna idhini ya kufikia kozi hii kwa sababu shirika lako halina fedha za kutosha. Tafadhali wasiliana na msimamizi wako wa edX ili kutatua hitilafu na kukupa ufikiaji wa maudhui haya.
Uandikishaji wako haujakamilika! Tayari umetumia bajeti yako ya kibinafsi kwa uandikishaji.
ExecutiveEducation2UError.noOfferWithRem: Uandikishaji wako haujakamilika! Umefikia idadi ya juu zaidi ya uandikishaji unaoruhusiwa.
executive.education.external.course.enro: Hitilafu imetokea wakati wa kushiriki maelezo ya uandikishaji wa kozi yako. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
Nimesoma na kukubali idhini ya kushiriki data ya GetSmarter.

Ninakubali kwamba maelezo kuhusu ushiriki wangu katika kozi hii yatashirikiwa na mimi
 mwajiri au taasisi ya ufadhili, ikijumuisha jina langu, tathmini za utendakazi wangu kama vile madaraja,
 na hatari yoyote inayoonekana kwa kukamilisha kwangu kozi.
Nimesoma na kukubali Sheria na Masharti ya GetSmarter kwa Wanafunzi
enterprise.dashboard.my.career.tab.add.j: Chukua dakika moja kuchagua jina la kazi ambalo linafafanua vyema jukumu lako la sasa au unalotaka. Tutakuambia ni ujuzi gani unapaswa kutafuta unapojiandikisha katika kozi, na kufuatilia ukuaji wa ujuzi wako unapomaliza kozi.
enterprise.dashboard.my.career.tab.exist: Using the Lightcast taxonomy, we trace your currently selected job title to the competencies and skills needed to succeed. As you pass courses on the edX platform teaching skills relevant to your current job, the graph above shows how you are growing in the competenices related to your role.
enterprise.coupon.codes.warning.modal.ti: You do not have enough codes to complete the program
enterprise.coupon.codes.warning.modal.bo:
Our records show that you do not have enough codes assigned to you in order to complete the program. If you are not able to complete all of the courses in the program, you will not be eligible to view or share your program record.

If you plan to complete the program, please contact your learning manager to have additional codes assigned to you.

Codes remaining: {couponCodesCount}
enterprise.program.courses.allCoursesAva: All courses included in your enterprise catalog
enterprise.program.courses.someCoursesAv: {courseCount} courses included in your enterprise catalog
enterprise.program.courses.noCourseAvail: These courses are not included in your enterprise catalog
enterprise.assignment.only.empty.state.a: Course discovery is not currently available
Your organization has chosen to share courses with you by assignment only. To request access to additional content, contact your administrator.
enterprise.assignment.only.empty.state.c: Start learning with courses assigned to you by your organization.
enterprise.search.page.academies.section: edX Academies; designed to meet your most critical business needs
Choose from a curated range of programs aligned to the most in demand capability and skill areas crucial to organization success.
